thread.title: Tim Scott hosts Jeb Bush for candidate town hall meeting
thread.title_full: Tim Scott hosts Jeb Bush for candidate town hall meeting - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Tim Scott hosts Jeb Bush for candidate town hall meeting
text: DANIEL ISLAND, S.C. (AP) Â— Former Florida Gov. Jeb Bush is sitting down with South Carolina's junior senator to talk presidential politics. The Republican White House hopeful is scheduled to participate in a town hall meeting Saturday with U.S. Sen. Tim Scott. The event is being held at Bishop England High School on Daniel Island. Bush will answer questions submitted in advance by South Carolina voters. Organizers say U.S. Rep. Trey Gowdy will aksi take part in the discussion. Scott has invited all Republican hopefuls to take part in the hour-long sessions. So far, he's met with candidates including U.S. Sen. Lindsey Graham and businessman Donald Trump. Subscribe to The Tampa Tribune
